login.title: Welcome to NSF database
login.incorrect-login: There is no user with this login

description.part1: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.
description.part2: Switch language between english and german using buttons above.

settings.title: Settings
settings.leader-comment-max-length: Comment max length on leaders interviews

add_leader_dialog.title: Adding leader
add_leader_dialog.exists: This leader already exists in database

add_project_dialog.title: Adding project
add_project_dialog.exists: This project already exists in database

confirm_delete.title: Confirm deleting
confirm_delete.description: Are you sure to delete last relation?

confirm_add_object.title: Confirm adding
confirm_add_object.description: Are you sure to add new leader/project to the database?

confirm_add_object.title: Confirm adding
confirm_add_object.description: Are you sure to add new option for answer to the database?

page_500.title: Internal Server Error (500)
page_500.text:
Sorry, something went wrong with server.
Try to reload site

page_400.title: Bad Request (400)
page_400.text:
Sorry, site have passed request with bad data.
Try to reload site

page_404.title: Not Found Error (404)
page_404.text:
Sorry, server can't found requested data.
Try to reload site

page_403.title: Forbidden (403)
page_403.text:
Sorry, you haven't enough rights to access this page.
Try to reauthorize or ask admin about your rights.

page_405.title: Method Not Allowed (405)
page_405.text:
Sorry, request is not allowed by server.
Try to reload site

page_404_client.title: Not Found Page (404)
page_404_client.text: Type another page address, or just go to the /login page
